title: Let us remove the "Bing search" context item
content:
When you install the official Outlook app on Android, Microsoft add a "Bing search" item to the context pop-up options (i.e. what you see when you select text).

Could Android 12 offer a way to remove this please?  Apps should not be allowed to hijack this... it's Bing today, but may-well be malware tomorrow...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
